commandDescription: Aggregates decomposed profiles back into monolithic metadata files.
sourcePathFlagDescription: The path to the directory containing the the decomposed metadata files.  Default value is './force-app/main/default/profiles/decomposed'.
decomposeDirFlagDescription: The name of the directory where decomposed metadata files reside.
errorSourcePathNotFound: source-path %s not found.  Use the 'source-path' flag to override the default location.
errorDecomposeDirNotFound: decompose-dir %s not found.  Use the `decompose-dir` flag to override the default location.
errorXmlParse: Failed to read or parse decomposed profile metadata.
metadataTypesFlagDescription: Comma-separated list of metadata types to decompose (can only include 'profiles' and 'permnissionsets').
